sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STRAND (Saxon) any ſhore or bank of a ſea or great river. Hence the ſtreet in the west ſuburbs of London, which lay next the ſhore or bank of the Thames, was called the Strand. An immunity from cuſtom, and all impoſitions upon goods or veſſels by land or water, was usually expreſſed by st rand or st ream.
